code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./profile_container.css';import{Profile_recents,Profile_info}from'../../components/index';import axios from'axios';import{Link,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile_container=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const[userr,setUser]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/users")).then(res=>{const filteredUser=res.data.filter(item=>item.username===id);setUser(filteredUser);}).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile_container__container section__padding",children:[userr[0]&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile_info,{contents:userr[0]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile_container__recents",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile_recents,{user:user,id:id})})]});};export default Profile_container;
